card.name: Resurrection
card.description: Add a copy of a random non-{{RARITY:TOKEN}} dead ally monster to your hand twice. If you have 15 or less {{HP}}, give them -1 {{COST}}.

description.now: Add a copy of a random non-{{RARITY:TOKEN}} dead ally monster to your hand twice. If you have 15 or less {{HP}}, give them -1 {{COST}}.
description.prev: Add a copy of 2 non {{RARITY:TOKEN}} ally dead monsters to your hand. If you have < 15 {{HP}}, add the next {{TRIBE:LOST_SOUL|1}} too.
